definition: to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Planting trees suitable to sites is the key factor of success in highway greening.
sentences.chinese: 适地适树是高速公路绿化成功的关键因素。

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面积植树造林绿化国土是跨世纪中国的一大课题。

sentences.english: New York City lags well behind other cities in green space.
sentences.chinese: 纽约的城市绿化已经落后于其他城市了。

sentences.english: Lots lush green areas for you to enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 地段上郁郁葱葱的绿化区让您享受。

sentences.english: To develop urban green planning system to strengthen urban greening segregating construction.
sentences.chinese: 要制定城市绿地系统规划，加强城市绿化隔离带建设。

sentences.english: The brakes let go and the car crashed through the bushes at the edge of the town common, gathering speed.
sentences.chinese: 刹车松开了，汽车碾过了镇边缓冲速度的绿化栏。

sentences.english: Conservation-oriented landscape is an important part of the society.
sentences.chinese: 节约型园林绿化是建设节约型社会的重要内容。

sentences.english: The application of ground cover plant in landscaping was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并且探讨了地被植物在园林绿化中的应用。

sentences.english: We should plant more trees to make our city greener .
sentences.chinese: 我们应该种植更多的树以使我们的城市变得更加绿化。

sentences.english: The urban landscape of common foliage plants.
sentences.chinese: 是城市园林绿化中常见的观叶植物。

sentences.english: From the environmental protection's standpoint, this paper discusses importance of highway virescence.
sentences.chinese: 本文从环境保护的观点，论述了公路绿化的重要性。

sentences.english: Some new techniques are outlined for reference in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了几种较新的垂直绿化技术，以供参考。

sentences.english: Road greening the city an important part of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 道路绿化是城市园林绿化的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Road greening the city an important part of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 道路绿化是城市园林绿化的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Willow has good resistance and is especially suitable for landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 柳树的抗性极好，特别适合用于园林绿化。

sentences.english: It's full of green belts and fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 它满是绿化带和清新空气。

definition: green area (e.g. urban park or garden)
a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment/revetment
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
(of an area) to have trees with shade-giving foliage/(of a road) to be tree-lined
